children.text: As we heard with the excerpts from the Foolproof Players on the previous page, most of the reenactments included in

come from some sort of archival record, whether it's a newspaper article, transcript, notebook, or something else. Yet, Lepore and her team occasionally create reenactments that aren't necessarily true (though, of course, the very question of what "truth" is remains unclear).
